Package main

Class Store

java.lang.Object
main.Store
public class Store extends Object
Class for a store, which stores the state of the current store for the day, and handles purchasing of these items
Author:
Callum Hampton, Geordie Gibson

    • buyWarrior

      public int buyWarrior(Warrior chosenWarrior, Player player, GameEnvironment game)
      Buys the specified Warrior from the store, if it can be afforded
      Parameters:
      chosenWarrior - Warrior chosen for purchase
      player - Player of game
      game - Game Environment instance
      Returns:
      Number corresponding to the outcome of the attempted purchase: 0 = team full, 1 = player can't afford Warrior, 2 = purchase successful

    • buyItem

      public int buyItem(int slotNum, Player player, GameEnvironment game)
      Buys the specified Item from the store, if it can be afforded
      Parameters:
      slotNum - Item chosen for purchase
      player - Player of game
      game - Game Environment instance
      Returns:
      Number corresponding to the outcome of the attempted purchase: 0 = not enough left, 1 = player can't afford Item, 2 = purchase successful
